dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so we were just looking at this Forbes article, right? About America's wealthiest celebrities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so we were just looking at this Forbes article, right? About America's wealthiest celebrities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's just wild, the sheer amount of money these people have. Like, a combined fortune of $18.7 billion. That's more than, uh, Iceland's GDP!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just wild, the sheer amount of money these people have. Like, a combined fortune of eighteen point seven billion dollars. That's more than, uh, Iceland's G D P!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: America's 10 wealthiest celebrities hold a combined fortune of $18.7 billion, more than the GDP of Iceland.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] I know, right?! It's just mind-boggling to think about.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right?! It's just mind-boggling to think about.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: George Lucas is still at the top, clocking in at $5.4 billion. Then Spielberg, Oprah... pretty much the usual suspects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: George Lucas is still at the top, clocking in at five point four billion dollars. Then Spielberg, Oprah... pretty much the usual suspects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1. George Lucas Net worth: $5.4 billion 2. Steven Spielberg $3.7 billion 3. Oprah Winfrey $2.8 billion

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, those are the established, um, you know, media moguls. But Michael Jordan jumping up the ranks? That's kinda cool.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, those are the established, um, you know, media moguls. But Michael Jordan jumping up the ranks? That's kinda cool.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Jordan (No. 4; $1.7 billion) climbs up the ranking with a $400 million net worth increase derived from his sneaker fortune and a 90% stake in the increasingly valuable Charlotte Hornets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! With his sneaker fortune and that huge stake in the Charlotte Hornets. Like, what, $500 million just from the team valuation?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! With his sneaker fortune and that huge stake in the Charlotte Hornets. Like, what, five hundred million dollars just from the team valuation?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His stake in the basketball team is valued at an estimated $800 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! But then, the big headline grabber, of course, Kylie Jenner. She's on track to be the youngest self-made billionaire ever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! But then, the big headline grabber, of course, Kylie Jenner. She's on track to be the youngest self-made billionaire ever.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: New to the list this year is Kylie Jenner, whose $900 million net worth puts her on track to become the youngest self-made billionaire ever.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Insane, right? Like, 21 years old. All from Kylie Cosmetics, basically. Her social media reach is just… wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Insane, right? Like, twenty one years old. All from Kylie Cosmetics, basically. Her social media reach is just... wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 21-year-old runs Kylie Cosmetics, which has shifted more than $630 million in makeup since its launch two years ago by targeting her 168 million-plus social media followers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally. 168 million followers, like, instant access to her customers. She owns eighty percent of that business, too!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally. one hundred sixty eight million followers, like, instant access to her customers. She owns eighty percent of that business, too!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jenner owns 100% of the bare-bones business, a stake valuable enough to put her among America's Richest Self-Made Womenand land her a spot on the cover of Forbes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then, tying with her for fifth spot is Jay-Z, who also, uh, made a *ton* of money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, tying with her for fifth spot is Jay-Z, who also, uh, made a ton of money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The biggest dollar gainer among existing listees is Jay-Z ($900 million), who ties with Jenner for the fifth spot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! His net worth is up $90 million from last year, thanks to his champagne and cognac ventures, plus Roc Nation and Tidal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! His net worth is up ninety million dollars from last year, thanks to his champagne and cognac ventures, plus Roc Nation and T I D A L.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His net worth is up $90 million from 2017's figure thanks to lucrative stakes in companies including Armand de Brignac champagne and D'Ussé cognac, plus holdings in his entertainment empire Roc Nation and streaming service Tidal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] And he had that great quote, like, about how people 'convince artists you can't be an artist and make money.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he had that great quote, like, about how people convince artists you can't be an artist and make money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That was the greatest trick in music that people ever pulled off, to convince artists that you can't be an artist and make money, Jay-Z told Forbes in 2010, foreshadowing the success of his ancillary businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? He totally proved that wrong. Diddy's on the list too, but Jay-Z just, uh, like, crushed it this year financially.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? He totally proved that wrong. Diddy's on the list too, but Jay-Z just, uh, like, crushed it this year financially.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He bests fellow rapper Diddy (No. 8; $820 million), who is the only other musician on a ranking that also includes an author and a magician.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's just, wow. And then you have, like, David Copperfield and Tiger Woods in there too. What a mix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just, wow. And then you have, like, David Copperfield and Tiger Woods in there too. What a mix.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 7. David Copperfield $875 million ... 9. (tie) Tiger Woods $800 million

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. It’s a whole different league of wealth, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. It's a whole different league of wealth, you know?
